Biography - Herbert A. Hauptman (1917-2011)

Biography | Publications | Curriculum Vitae| Videos | Slides | Articles | Obituary

Herbert A. Hauptman (1917-2011) shared the 1985 Nobel Prize for Chemistry with Jerome Karle.
